input_email_body:
Subject: Medical Data Breach Event Notification

I am in the process of reporting a medical data breach which was caused by unsecured PDF files. The root issue lies in a lack of encryption and proper access management You can reach me at elena.ivanova@support.org.. Despite efforts to update PDFfiller and review settings within Ruby on Rails, the problem remains unresolved. I urgently require additional support to guarantee the safety of our medical information. My name is Liu Wei.
